UniprotID	Q9BXK1
Accession	Q9BXK1
EntryName	KLF16_HUMAN
ProteinName	Krueppel-like factor 16 (Basic transcription element-binding protein 4) (BTE-binding protein 4) (Novel Sp1-like zinc finger transcription factor 2) (Transcription factor BTEB4) (Transcription factor NSLP2)
GeneName	KLF16 BTEB4 NSLP2
Length	252
Function	Transcription factor that binds GC and GT boxes and displaces Sp1 and Sp3 from these sequences. Modulates dopaminergic transmission in the brain (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
